original_text: So they laid hands on her, and she went into the entrance of the horse gate of the king's house, and they put her to death there.
korean_text: 이에 무리가 그에게 길을 열어 주고 그가 왕궁 말문 어귀에 이를 때에 거기서 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: So they laid hands on her
and she went into the entrance of the horse gate of the king's house
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 왕의 집 말문 입구로 들어갔고

sentences.original_text: and they put her to death there
